short_summary: DoD wants to buy a contract for the DND
description: HVAC Systems Maintenance and Repair for the Department of National Defence (DND) at the Fredericton, Woodstock, Grand Falls and Edmundston Armouries.

full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the maintenance and repair of Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC) systems at the Fredericton, Woodstock, Grand Falls, and Edmundston Armouries.

#### Details

*   **Tender Reference:** WS4352129277
*   **Amendment Number:** 3
*   **Publication Date:** 2023-12-14
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-01-22T14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-02-29
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-02-28

#### The Project Objective

The successful bidder will be responsible for the maintenance and repair of the HVAC systems at the specified locations. Services may include, but are not limited to, routine maintenance, repair, and replacement of equipment.

#### Tender Status

The tender has expired. Interested contractors are no longer able to submit proposals.

#### Contracting Entity

*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
*   **Contact Information:** Kate Mintzer (elle-la / she-her), kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Additional Information

*   **Procurement Category:** Service
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements:** The tender is open to contractors who are registered under the following trade agreements: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and more. (Please see attached trade agreements list for full details.)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** New Brunswick
*   **Regions of Delivery:** New Brunswick

To access the full tender details and to submit a proposal, please visit the Ariba Discovery website at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18283991?extsite=MTgyODM5OTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MD
